00007 int GLShaderFactory::readFragmentShaderSourceFromFile(const char* Filename, char *readBuffer, unsigned int maxReadLength)
00008 {
00009     printf("Reading fragment shader source\n");
00010 
00011     FILE* fin = fopen(Filename, "r");
00012 
00013     if (fin == NULL) return -1;
00014 
00015     unsigned int cPtrPosition = 0;
00016 
00017     while (true)
00018     {
00019         int readChar = fgetc(fin);
00020 
00021         if (readChar == EOF) break;
00022 
00023         readBuffer[cPtrPosition] = readChar;
00024         cPtrPosition++;
00025     }
00026 
00027     readBuffer[cPtrPosition] = '\0';
00028 
00029     return cPtrPosition;
00030 }

00058 void skipWhitespace(const char* inputData, size_t* cPtr)
00059 {
00060     while (true)
00061     {
00062 
00063         if ( inputData[*cPtr] == '\0')
00064         {
00065 
00066             return;
00067 
00068         }
00069         else if ( isspace( inputData[*cPtr]) == false)
00070         {
00071 
00072             return;
00073 
00074         }
00075         else
00076         {
00077 
00078             *cPtr = *cPtr + 1;
00079 
00080         }
00081 
00082     }
00083 
00084 }

00086 bool nextWord(const char* inputData, size_t* cPtr, char* wordBuffer)
00087 {
00088     skipWhitespace(inputData, cPtr);
00089 
00090     inputData = inputData + *cPtr;
00091 
00092     if (*inputData == '"')
00093     {
00094 
00095         //TODO: QUOTES MAY BE USED IN SHADERS AT SOME POINT, NEED TO MAKE SURE ITS THE END SHADER "; found! Room for improvement here
00096 
00097         //Increment 1 and discard the opening "
00098         *cPtr += 1;
00099         inputData = inputData + 1;
00100 
00101         //Find the end of the quote
00102         const char* end = strstr(inputData, "\";");
00103 
00104         size_t difference = end - inputData;
00105 
00106         strncpy(wordBuffer, inputData, difference);
00107         wordBuffer[difference] = '\0';
00108 
00109         //Add two onto the difference for the ";
00110         *cPtr += difference + 2;
00111 
00112         return true;
00113     }
00114     else
00115     {
00116 
00117         const char* nextSpace = strchr(inputData, ' ');
00118 
00119         if (nextSpace == 0)
00120         {
00121 
00122             return false;
00123 
00124         }
00125         else
00126         {
00127 
00128             size_t difference = nextSpace - inputData;
00129 
00130             strncpy(wordBuffer, inputData, difference);
00131             wordBuffer[difference] = '\0';
00132 
00133             *cPtr += difference + 1;
00134 
00135             return true;
00136         }
00137 
00138     }
00139 
00140 }

00142 Shader* GLShaderFactory::loadShader(File* fileNode)
00143 {
00144     if (fileNode == 0) return 0;
